reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Conduct market assessment on the required machineries for small wind turbines build the capacity of selected targets from students and local renewable energy experts/entrepreneurs conduct training of trainers to empower the targeted group for national wind turbine construction train installers on appropriate business models and create appropriate communication tools to connect the system for 700-1000 household members in Harrores woreda of the Ethiopian Somali Region. The stakeholders are Bureau of Finance and Economy at regional level woreda bureau of administration health and elders and community members in Harrores woreda that promised to support the project in labor and kind Jigjiga Vocational school and last but not least Mercy Corps of the USAID on te chnical back up. The project outcome/output is to bring electric light to targeted communities and enhance delivery of mothers at health post level where the electricity will be also extended.
